title: BRIEF-Varian Medical Systems Replaced $600 Mln Revolving Credit Facility With Revolving Credit Facility, Terminated Credit Agreement Entered On Sept 1
text:
Market News April 4, 2018 / 8:36 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Varian Medical Systems Replaced $600 Mln Revolving Credit Facility With Revolving Credit Facility, Terminated Credit Agreement Entered On Sept 1 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 4 (Reuters) - Varian Medical Systems Inc: 
* REPLACED $600 MILLION REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY WITH REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY, TERMINATED CREDIT AGREEMENT ENTERED ON SEPT 1, 2017 * YEAR REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY OF UP TO $1.8 BILLION​ 
* VARIAN MEDICAL SYSTEMS SAYS ENTERED INTO A REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT - SEC FILING 
* FACILITY FOR ISSUANCE OF LETTERS OF CREDIT AND PERMITS SWING LINE LOANS OF UP TO $25 MILLION​ Source text: [ bit.ly/2IvH5I1 ] Further company coverage:
